mapper.select: select emp_num, emp_name, direct_num, d.code_value dept, r.code_value rank, permission_type, annual_num, hire_date, departure_date, email, phone, post_code, address, detail_address from EMP e join code_table d on e.dept = d.code_name join code_table r on e.rank = r.code_name where emp_num = #{emp_num}
select pwd from EMP where email = #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and regist_num = #{regist_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select email from EMP where emp_name = #{emp_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and regist_num = #{regist_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from EMP where email = #{email}
select email, emp_num, emp_name, permission_type from EMP where email=#{email} AND pwd = #{pwd}

SELECT e.emp_num, e.emp_name, e.permission_type , d.code_name dept_code, d.code_value dept,r.code_name rank_code , r.code_value rank, w.work_name, e.email, e.hire_date, e.departure_date, e.reason,e.direct_num,e.phone,e.regist_num,e.annual_num, e.post_code, e.address,e.detail_address, e.remarks, e.work_num FROM EMP e inner join code_table d on d.code_name = e.dept inner join code_table r on r.code_name = e.rank inner join work w on w.work_num = e.work_num order by emp_num

SELECT e.emp_num, e.emp_name, e.permission_type , d.code_name dept_code, d.code_value dept,r.code_name rank_code , r.code_value rank, w.work_name, e.email, e.hire_date, e.departure_date, e.reason,e.direct_num,e.phone,e.regist_num,e.annual_num, e.post_code, e.address,e.detail_address, e.remarks, e.work_num FROM EMP e inner join code_table d on d.code_name = e.dept inner join code_table r on r.code_name = e.rank inner join work w on w.work_num = e.work_num
where 1=1
AND e.emp_num like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND emp_name like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND to_char(e.hire_date,'yyyyMM') = #{searchWord}
AND d.code_value like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND r.code_value like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND w.work_name like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND e.remarks like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
mapper.update: update EMP set emp_name = #{emp_name}, dept = #{dept}, rank = #{rank}, phone = #{phone}, permission_type = #{permission_type}, direct_num = #{direct_num}, post_code = #{post_code}, address = #{address}, detail_address = #{detail_address}, reason = #{reason, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hire_date = #{hire_date}, departure_date = #{departure_date, jdbcType=DATE}, work_num = #{work_num} where emp_num = #{emp_num}
update EMP set pwd = #{pwd} where email = #{email}
